    • saveBook

      public void saveBook(Long id, String title, String authors, String genre, String publisher, java.time.Year publishmentYear, Integer amount) throws ServiceException, ValidationException
      Description copied from interface: BookService
      Inserts or updates the Book in the database
      Specified by:
      saveBook in interface BookService
      Parameters:
      id - id of Book. If null, the book is inserted into the database. If not null, the Book is updated in the database
      title - title of the Book
      authors - String representing authors of the Book, separated by commas
      genre - genre of the Book
      publisher - publisher of the Book
      publishmentYear - Year object representing publishment year of the Book
      amount - Integer object representing the number of Book in stock
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs
      ValidationException - if the Book with the passed parameters is not deemed valid
